DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center screen study conduct cognition assessment collect reference data comparison patient depression healthy volunteer . Data collect 6 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Screening Study To Assess The Cognition Status Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer , 18 65 year age , inclusive Healthy volunteer stable chronic disease associate cognitive deficit ( e.g . asthma ) require treatment know affect cognition discuss medical monitor enrollment A body mass index 18 30 kg/m2 inclusive Able participate willing give write informed consent comply study restriction At least second generation resident country origin Current past history psychiatric disorder Family history psychiatric disorder Suspicion evidence regular consumption drug abuse positive drug test screen visit Acute chronic disorder stable may affect cognition need treatment affect cognition Change smoking behavior smoke cessation therapy within 30 day screen visit Positive result hepatitis B , hepatitis C , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) 1 2 Systolic blood pressure great 140 less 90 mm Hg , diastolic blood pressure great 100 less 50 mm Hg Resting Pulse Rate great 100 less 45 beat per minute Clinically significant abnormality laboratory test result ECG assessment screen visit Participation investigational drug study within 1 month prior baseline
